references.paper_title: Towards understanding ensemble, knowledge distillation and self-distillation in deep learning
references.reason: This paper provides theoretical insights into feature learning and generalisation, which are key themes in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Benign overfitting in two-layer convolutional neural networks
references.reason: This paper explores the phenomenon of benign overfitting, which is relevant to the target paper’s analysis of feature learning in neural networks.

references.paper_title: Improved regularization of convolutional neural networks with cutout
references.reason: This paper introduces the Cutout data augmentation technique, which is a central focus of the target paper’s analysis.

references.paper_title: CutMix: Regularization strategy to train strong classifiers with localizable features
references.reason: This paper introduces the CutMix data augmentation technique, another central focus of the target paper’s analysis.
This paper provides a theoretical framework for understanding data augmentation through the lens of feature manipulation, which directly informs the target paper’s approach.
